si.title: බස් අනතුර;පුද්ගලයන් 9 දෙනෙක් තුවාල ලැබූහ
body_lines: සිද්ධිය ඉරිදා (12) ඉරිදා (12) හකුනුවර සිට මහනුවරට අයත් හකුරංගෙත ඩිපෝවට අයත් බස් රථයක් මයිලපිටි ප්රදේශයේ ඉතිරිව තිබේ.

en.title: Bus accident;9 people injured
body_lines: The incident took place on Sunday (12) that nine people, including driver and conductor, were injured when a bus belonging to the Hakurangettha depot from Hakurangetha to Kandy was left in the Mayilapitiya area.

summary_lines: On Sunday, a bus accident in Mayilapitiya injured nine, including the driver and conductor, on the route from Hakurangetha to Kandy.
